text: Giorgio Zuccoli (17 February 1958 – 27 March 2001) was an Italian yacht racer who competed in the 1988 Summer Olympics and in the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Sailors at the 1992 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Tornado class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Italy
title: Giorgio Zuccoli
